title: CURATED FIREWORKS
description: CURATED FIREWORKS - is an extensive sound library containing 131 unique files of Fireworks (commercial and recreational) in varying environments and conditions.
longDescription: CURATED FIREWORKS - is an extensive sound library containing 131 unique files of Fireworks (commercial and recreational) in varying environments and conditions ranging from large scale barrages of professional events, New Year’s celebrations in the city, communities and neighborhoods to single shots of bottle rockets, poppers, fountains and mortars. All of our libraries comply with the Universal Category System metadata naming convention standard. Files are presented in 44.1 kHz/ 16 bit (VIDEO GAME).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  131 Unique .wav files of Fireworks in various environments and conditions.
  •  Universal Category System metadata file naming standard.
  •  Royalty-Free.

Number of Audio Waves: 131

Number of Audio Cues: 131

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 172

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1nOMeC7frvmYDZHlIlAnSkEEH77ho7cwV/view?usp=share_link

Demo: https://soundcloud.com/sound-assets/curated-fireworks-demo?si=63de5c30575048dc930821bfaa6e051c&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing
